amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 21 in the Congressional Record of July 21, 1995, to earmark $26 million of the budget authority allowed in the bill for mass transit formula grants to rural transit programs.

action.text: Mr. Wolf raised a point of order against the Danner amendment (A005). Mr. Wolf stated that the increase in funds earmarked in the amendment were not previously authorized and were, therefore, a violation of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.
